name: (2R,3S,4S)-leucoanthocyanidin,2-oxoglutarate:oxygen oxidoreductase
definition: (2R,3S,4S)-Leucoanthocyanidin + 2-Oxoglutarate + Oxygen + H+ <=> Anthocyanidin with a 3-hydroxy group + Succinate + CO2 + 2 H2O
